name: FunFacts
0:
”Alexa, open fun facts”
”Alexa, start fun facts”
”Alexa, begin fun facts”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fun facts
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The perfect skill for anyone who loves trivia!

Example:
Who was the legendary Benedictine monk who invented champagne? 
 Dom Perignon.

To begin the skill, just say:
"Alexa, begin Fun Facts."
"Alexa, open Fun Facts."
or
"Alexa, start Fun Facts."

Please let us know if you like this skill.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
